title: Received 2 Key Fragments while Loot System was down, when it returns online the Fragments are gone
body:
Can I receive these two Key Fragments that I lost?

Thanks!

replies.body: I looked into this for you, but I haven't seen a fragment drop since the 2nd.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take a deeper look to see if we can find out.  See you there!
